name: San Andreas Monster hero
description:
San Andreas Monster hero game is a strategy and real story adventure game. If you are a fan of US Police chase games, San Andreas mafia games or love to deliver parcels or hot pizza then you are on right location. This game includes everything from going to town till life surviving.

May be you are thinking reason of San Andreas Monster hero? It’s because this is Mission base strategy game:

Buy a House:

First of all you need to buy a house so you and your family can live happily.
Buy New Clothes from town market:
On next mission you need to buy some clothes so you can look better.

Find a job:

Now a days to survive job is very necessary so start your futuristic bike and find some job. Your family depend on you, be a good person and find a well-paid job. Go to town and find job, Now a days parcel delivery or Hot pizza delivery is common go for it, do your best to impress your boss.

Deliver parcels and hot Pizza’s:

After getting good job now it’s your task to deliver important stealth mission documents on destination. For some missions you have to deliver hot pizza on futuristic bike, don’t rush your futuristic pizza bike in traffic or signals. Be aware of US police don’t drive your futuristic bike too fast.

Beat your Boss:
Your boss is not happy with your performance even you are doing your best to deliver hot pizza on time but still he fired you from job. Take your revenge from your evil boss and beat your boss.

Join a San Andreas underworld mafia:

After quieting a good job now you are fed up! What can you do now? You have only one option after fed up from this evil world. Join a San Andreas underworld mafia crew and build your empire. You can Snatch any muscle car or futuristic bike because you are now Mafia member.

Beat US police cop and Impress your Mafia boss:

Most difficult task to beat US police cop and some underworld mafia bosses to impress your Crew. Fight with US police cops and make a good impact on your Mafia Crew.

US Police Raid as someone Betrayed:

Someone betrayed your San Andreas Mafia Crew and police Raid on your location. Try to run from Police, If they caught you they’ll put you in Alcatraz jail for lifetime. No one ever survive from Alcatraz jail.

Jail Survival Stealth Mission:

San Andreas Monster hero sent to death jail Alcatraz due to a conspiracy of beating a US Police cop and the only way to save you is to break out the prison escape from inside. Befriends with other monster hero mafia’s to get prison escape help, fight with other crime gangsters to gain respect, or just dig an stealth mission escape tunnel underneath the prison cell. It’s all you call!

Lesson Learnt & Go Back to Your Family:

Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing. Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend with your family don’t ruin it on doing something bad, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.

Features:

• Stunning sounds to enhance your gaming experience
• Drive cool custom designed Futuristic pizza rider motorcycle
• Stunning Gameplay with variety of strategy levels.
• Futuristic HD 3D Graphics with variety of muscle cars, bikes and buses.

WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK:

San Andreas Monster hero is about 13 Reasons to Survive Game will be updated soon according to your suggestions. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.
